movie.title: The Barefoot Executive
movie.description_intro: A young man who works in the mailroom at a TV network wants to move up the corporate ladder but finds himself stymied by his selfish boss. By chance he discovers that his neighbor's chimpanzee has a knack for picking successful TV programs. He uses the chimp's programming skills to land himself a job in the programming department of the network.
movie.description_full: A young man who works in the mailroom at a TV network wants to move up the corporate ladder but finds himself stymied by his selfish boss. By chance he discovers that his neighbor's chimpanzee has a knack for picking successful TV programs. He uses the chimp's programming skills to land himself a job in the programming department of the network.

movies.title: Surf's Up 2: WaveMania
movies.summary: An animated comedy that features WWE Superstars, providing their own voices while matching up against talking animals.
movies.description_full: An animated comedy that features WWE Superstars, providing their own voices while matching up against talking animals.
movies.synopsis: An animated comedy that features WWE Superstars, providing their own voices while matching up against talking animals.

movies.title: Hot Pursuit
movies.summary: Young Danny is following his rich girlfriend's family to the Caribbean. But suddenly he simply must take a chemistry test and cannot go with them. After they have left, he gets a leave from his professor and takes a plane to find them. But he is not quite sure where they are, and meets smugglers, crazy captains and murderers.

After they have left, he gets a leave from his professor and takes a plane to find them. But he is not quite sure where they are, and meets smugglers, crazy captains and murderers.

movies.title: Space Milkshake
movies.summary: Four blue collar astronauts who are stuck together on a Sanitation Station after they bring a mysterious device aboard their ship and all life on Earth disappears. Discovering what happened to civilization is only the first of many galactic-level crises the astronauts will have to face as they are about to come under attack by a mutating rubber duck named Gary, who wants to open a portal to his evil dimension and take over the Universe.

movies.title: 40 Pounds of Trouble
movies.summary: Hilarity ensues when a casino manager spends a day at Disneyland with a cute but troublesome little girl.
